name: Bounty For Sharks
description:
A first person shooter with killer sharks. Kill Sharks for bounty, spend coins to upgrade.

There is a wave of 3 sharks followed by a wave of 6, they get stronger and you can buy upgrades. It gets tough very quickly so get your upgrades. After you are defeated you can see your score and try again.

I recently got a high score of 875 in cycle 14 can you do better?

Press M to Mute Music.
